docs.title: Table of Contents
docs.text:
• Introduction - Overview of the YouZoo project.

  • Changelog - List of changes and updates.

  • Roadmap - Future and upcoming features/developments.

  • Contributions - Team members and their roles and contributions.

  • Feedback - Feedback and suggestions.

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text:
This document chronicles the significant milestones and updates in the development of our project. It serves as a historical record of our progress and achievements

Info

Note: This changelog highlights key events and updates. For a comprehensive list of changes, please refer to the commit history in our GitHub repository

2025-10-21:

Success

Project repository successfully created and initial structure set up.

  • Initial commit Habibur Rahman

2025-11-05:

  • Amended README.md with project details and tech stack, improving clarity on project goals.

2025-11-17:

Success

Documentation site using MKDocs Material successfully set up and deployed.

  • Added mkdocs.yml configuration for MKDOCS Material Habibur Rahman

  • Updated project_structure.md to include documentation site and Trello board badges. Habibur Rahman

  • Created index.md with links to key documentation pages. Habibur Rahman

  • Added Github Actions workflow for CI/CD to mkdocs.yml file. Habibur Rahman

  • Set up initial documentation structure with sections for project overview, setup instructions, and contribution guidelines. Habibur Rahman

docs.title: Contributions

docs.title: Feedback
docs.text: This document is intended to provide evidence on how user feedback has been collected and addressed throughout the development of our project and to outline our plans for future improvements based on this feedback.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: This project is a collaborative effort to develop a comprehensive pet e-commerce platform that addresses the needs of both buyers and sellers. Our goal is to create a user-friendly, secure, and scalable application that facilitates seamless online transactions.

docs.title: Project Overview
docs.text: The pet e-commerce platform will offer a wide range of products and services for pet owners, including pet food, pet toys, pet clothes, pet grooming, and pet travel accessories. The platform will feature an intuitive interface, robust search functionality, and personalized recommendations to enhance the shopping experience using state-of-the-art technologies which can be found in Project Structure.

docs.title: Key Features
docs.text:
• User Registration and Authentication: Secure sign-up and login processes for users.

  • Product Listings: Detailed product pages with images, descriptions, and reviews.

  • Shopping Cart and Checkout: Easy-to-use cart system with multiple payment options.

  • Admin Dashboard: Tools for managing products, orders, and users.

  • Responsive Design: Optimized for both desktop and mobile devices to ensure accessibility.

docs.title: Roadmap
docs.text: This document outlines the planned features and milestones for the development of our pet e-commerce platform. The roadmap is divided into phases, each focusing on specific aspects of the project to ensure a structured and efficient development process.
